entry.tran: 拉皮条的男子；为妓女拉客的男子
entry.def: A pimp is a man who gets clients for prostitutes and takes a large part of the money the prostitutes earn.
Someone who pimps gets clients for prostitutes and takes a large part of the money the prostitutes earn.

example.ex: He stole, lied, deceived and pimped his way out of poverty.
example.tran: 他通过偷窃、撒谎、欺诈和拉皮条使自己摆脱了贫困。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who procures customers for whores (in England they call a pimp a ponce)
1. arrange for sexual partners for others
